org.wso2.carbon.gateway.httploadbalancer.algorithm.weighted

Interface WeightedAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LoadBalancingAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightedRandom, WeightedRoundRobin

    public interface WeightedAlgorithm
extends LoadBalancingAlgorithm
    All Weighted Algorithms must implement this interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setLBOutboundEndpoints

        void setLBOutboundEndpoints(java.util.List<LBOutboundEndpoint> lbOutboundEPs,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> weights)
        Parameters:
        lbOutboundEPs - List of LBOutboundEndpoints
        weights - Their corresponding weights.

        NOTE: All validations must be done before. This method expects ordered list of endpoints and their corresponding weights.

      • receive

        boolean receive(org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonMessage carbonMessage,
                org.wso2.carbon.messaging.CarbonCallback carbonCallback,
                LoadBalancerConfigContext context,
                LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        carbonMessage - CarbonMessage
        carbonCallback - CarbonCallback
        context - LoadBalancerConfigContext
        lbOutboundEndpoint - LBOutboundEndpoint
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NOTE: Unlike Simple algorithms, in case if decision is made based on persistence, algorithm should know that request is being sent to an endpoint. So that it can increment window tracker and weighted load distribution can be done in a much efficient way.
